actions.name: Hyperamped

cost.trigger: The user declares an Electric type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares an Electric type attack.
Effect: The triggering attack consumes double PP. The user gains +1 ATK, SPATK, and SPD stage for 5 activations before resolving the attack.

system.description:
Trigger: The user declares an Electric type attack.
Effect: The triggering attack consumes double PP. The user gains +1 ATK, SPATK, and SPD stage for 5 activations before resolving the attack.
